channel.title: Calendar on Engineering Field Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Calendar on Engineering Field Notes

item.description: Red Team Cases Tunneling can be a series of data leaking & C2 attacks …… [[201909261144]] Spam a client through account verification …… [[201910191200]], instead of using SMS, email verification can be used in the lab SQL Injection with backdoor injection …… [[201910201702]][[201910201719]]

SSL VPN Pros & Cons SSL VPN pros: More adaptable to almost all environment. Only a HTTP service needs to be exposed to the INTERNET. only a browser is needed; other services in an intra-net will be proxied by the browser service P6 of 1 cons: 3 major SSL VPN vendors dominate 75% market share, so any exploit is highly repeatable. easily be forgotten after deployment P9, P15 of 1

Tunneling any protocol can be used as a underlaid transportation protocol, like ICMP, DNS, SMB, HTTP. It’s effective since lots of perimeter defense either ignore them or isn’t capable of analyze them1 [[Flying A False Flag: Advanced C2, Trust Conflicts, and Domain Takeover]] ↩︎
The performance of Rest API framework The Falcon has way better performance than Flask.1 [[Falcon: A Python Framework for Writing Excellent Microservices and APIs]] ↩︎

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description:
Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de

pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
